protocol.name: Affymetrix:Protocol:ExpressionStat
protocol.text: Title: Affymetrix CHP Analysis (ExpressionStat). Description:

protocol.name: Affymetrix:Protocol:Hybridization-Unknown
protocol.text: Affymetrix Generic Hybridization

protocol.name: P-AFFY-6
protocol.text: Title: Affymetrix CEL analysis. Description:

protocol.name: P-G11558-1
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana ecotype col2 seedlings were grown in a 12h light / 12 h dark cycle (day and night temperature was 22Â°C) on vertical agar plates supplemented with half-strength Murashige and Skoog (MS) medium (Duchefa Biochemie B.V., Haarlem, the Netherlands) supplemented with 1% sucrose. The roots of the plants were growing on the surface of the agar, thus avoiding restricted oxygen diffusion towards the roots by the agar medium.

protocol.name: P-G11558-10
protocol.text: Ten days after germination, seedlings were transferred to continuous darkness and a stream of premixed air containing 4% oxygen concentrations, 350 ppm CO2, and N2 was blown over the plates. Oxygen concentrations within the plates were regularly controlled to ensure precise regulation of the actual oxygen concentration around the roots. Roots were harvested in liquid nitrogen after 30 min. of each oxygen treatment.

protocol.name: P-G11558-11
protocol.text: Ten days after germination, seedlings were transferred to continuous darkness and a stream of premixed air containing 4% oxygen concentrations, 350 ppm CO2, and N2 was blown over the plates. Oxygen concentrations within the plates were regularly controlled to ensure precise regulation of the actual oxygen concentration around the roots. Roots were harvested in liquid nitrogen after 48 hours of each oxygen treatment.

protocol.name: P-G11558-12
protocol.text: Ten days after germination, seedlings were transferred to continuous darkness and a stream of premixed air containing 4% oxygen, 350 ppm CO2, and N2 was blown over the plates. Oxygen concentrations within the plates were regularly controlled to ensure precise regulation of the actual oxygen concentration around the roots. Roots were harvested in liquid nitrogen after 48 hours of each oxygen treatment.

protocol.name: P-G11558-13
protocol.text: Ten days after germination, seedlings were transferred to continuous darkness and a stream of premixed air containing 8% oxygen , 350 ppm CO2, and N2 was blown over the plates. Oxygen concentrations within the plates were regularly controlled to ensure precise regulation of the actual oxygen concentration around the roots. Roots were harvested in liquid nitrogen after 2 hours of each oxygen treatment.
